attr_Coffee_Type: Type of coffee included in the gift.
attr_Origin_Country: Country where the packaged coffee gift originated.
attr_Processing_Method: The method used to process the Arabica coffee beans after harvesting.
attr_Screen_Size: The screen size used to grade the unroasted coffee beans based on their size.
attr_Coffee_Grade: The grade or classification of the Arabica coffee based on bean size, quality, and defects.
attr_Certifications: Certifications associated with the coffee, indicating adherence to specific standards.
attr_Flavor: Specific added flavor or flavoring agent used in the flavored coffee product.
attr_Package_Weight: Net weight of the flavored coffee product per package.
attr_Brand: Brand name of the packaged coffee gift.
attr_Package_Type: Type of packaging for the coffee gift.
